thread.title: Your Voice, Your Choice: Ask Bobby Jindal a question
thread.title_full: Your Voice, Your Choice: Ask Bobby Jindal a question | Washington Examiner

author: <span class="author">Washington Examiner Staff
title: Your Voice, Your Choice: Ask Bobby Jindal a question
text:
Voters in Iowa and New Hampshire get unprecendented access to White House aspirants, but those who do not live in early primary states often feel left out. To help address this isssue, the Washington Examiner is teaming up with Vekeo for the Your Voice, Your Choice TeleForum , allowing people from accross the country to ask questions of presidential candidates.
First up is Republican presidential candidate Gov. Bobby Jindal, R-La., who will be fielding questions on Monday Oct. 26, at 7 p.m. ET — allowing you to participate in the town hall experience by phone. Sign up here .
Join the Examiner's chief political correspondent Byron York, as we give you the opportunity to ask Gov. Jindal directly about the issues that matter the most to you, live and unfiltered. This is a first in series of forums. Learn more here .
Details: 
More from the Washington Examiner Carter confirms Obama reconsidering Afghan troop withdrawal The defense secretary said the idea that the U.S. is leaving Afghanistan is "self-defeating."
By Jacqueline Klimas • 10/14/15 2:17 PM What : Your Voice, Your Choice TeleForum with Gov. Bobby Jindal, R-La.
When : Monday October 26, 7 p.m. ET
How : Sign up here
